infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan barcodes on printed tracker cards.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to help you to track your movements while using the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to help you to track your movements while using the app and in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location to help you to track your movements in the background.
